methods.name: Index
methods.description: Create an Index object to interact with a Google Cloud Search index.

examples.caption: A document can be built using the search/document object.
A document can also be created from a properly-formed object as outlined in the official docs. This will create the same resulting document object as the example above.
Specifying an ID for your new document isn't required. In both of the scenarios above, simply don't specify 'new-document-id' and one will be generated for you.

params.name: documentObj
params.description: • A properly-formed Document object as outlined in the official docs.

params.name: callback.err
params.description: • An error returned while making this request

examples.caption: Documents can also be created from objects.

methods.name: getDocuments
methods.description: Get search/document objects for all of the documents in this index.

examples.caption: To control how many API requests are made and page through the results manually, set autoPaginate to false.
Get the documents as a readable object stream.
If you anticipate many results, you can end a stream early to prevent unnecessary processing and API requests.

params.name: query.pageSize
params.description: • The maximum number of documents to return per page. If not specified, 100 documents are returned per page.

params.name: query.pageToken
params.description: • A previously-returned page token representing part of the larger set of results to view.

params.name: query.view
params.description: • One of INDEX_VIEW_UNSPECIFIED, ID_ONLY, or FULL. See this table for more details.

params.name: callback.err
params.description: • An error returned while making this request

params.name: callback.nextQuery
params.description: • If present, query with this object to check for more results.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Run a query against the documents in this index.

examples.caption: To control how many API requests are made and page through the results manually, set autoPaginate to false.
Get the documents that match your query as a readable object stream.

params.name: query
params.description: • A query object or simply a string query.

params.name: query.pageSize
params.description: • The maximum number of documents to return per page. If not specified, 100 documents are returned per page.

params.name: query.pageToken
params.description: • A previously-returned page token representing part of the larger set of results to view.

params.name: query.query
params.description: = A query string using the syntax described by the official docs.

params.name: callback.err
params.description: • An error returned while making this request

params.name: callback.nextQuery
params.description: • If present, query with this object to check for more results.

exceptions.description: If a query string or object isn't provided.
